title: Gattaca
actors: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Gore Vidal
plot: Vincent, an "In-Valid," assumes the identity of a member of the genetic elite to pursue his goal of traveling into space with the Gattaca Aerospace Corporation. However, a week before his mission, a murder marks Vincent as a suspect.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 6 wins & 16 nominations total
